statements: SELECT * FROM remote_team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT id, name, position FROM remote_team_members WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT email, position FROM remote_team_members WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, position, department FROM remote_team_members WHERE location = 'San Francisco' AND department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM remote_team_members WHERE last_updated >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY name DESC, last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, email FROM remote_team_members WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY location, name LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT location, department FROM remote_team_members WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, position FROM remote_team_members WHERE location IN ('New York', 'San Francisco')
SELECT name, email FROM remote_team_members WHERE position LIKE '%Lead'
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM team_profiles WHERE profile_description LIKE '%team%';
SELECT member_name, member_phone FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name ASC, member_phone DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 5;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT team_members.member_name, team_profiles.profile_description FROM team_members JOIN team_profiles ON team_members.member_id = team_profiles.member_id WHERE team_profiles.profile_id < 10;
SELECT DISTINCT member_id, member_name FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, UPPER(member_email) AS uppercase_email FROM team_members;
SELECT * FROM remote_team_members;
SELECT full_name, email FROM remote_team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM remote_team_members WHERE id = 3;
SELECT city, country, notes FROM contact_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT bio, skills FROM profiles WHERE member_id = 2;

SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM remote_team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM remote_team_members ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contact_information WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT id, full_name, bio, skills FROM remote_team_members JOIN profiles ON remote_team_members.id = profiles.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT full_name, email, department FROM team_members WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, full_name, position FROM team_members ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT team_member_id, update_timestamp, update_description FROM profile_updates WHERE team_member_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM team_members
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT full_name, email, department FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Sales'
SELECT full_name, city, position FROM team_members ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT * FROM team_members JOIN work_schedule ON team_members.id = work_schedule.team_member_id
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT member_id, phone_number FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM MemberStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT member_id, skill_name FROM MemberSkills ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT * FROM MemberRoles WHERE role_name = 'Developer';
SELECT member_id, skill_name FROM MemberSkills ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MemberAvailability WHERE available_hours > 8 ORDER BY available_date ASC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM MemberStatus GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
